name: Canvas Component Export

movements.name: Export

beats.title: Query All Components
beats.userStory: As an operations system, I want queryAllComponents to execute reliably with latency < 1 second so that dependent services meet their SLA targets (goal: 99.9% success rate).
beats.testCase: allows relative and approved bare imports

then: components enumerate deterministically with stable ordering

beats.title: Discover Components from DOM
beats.scenario: Scan, Discover, or Analyze discover Components From Dom
beats.userStory: As an operations system, I want discoverComponentsFromDom to execute reliably with latency < 5 seconds so that dependent services meet their SLA targets (goal: 99.9% success rate).
beats.testCase: forwards to drop symphony and does not render React nodes directly

then: elements map to model nodes 1:1; latency ≤ 100ms
and: invalid nodes are logged with reason

beats.title: Collect CSS Classes
beats.userStory: As an operations system, I want collectCssClasses to execute reliably with latency < 1 second so that dependent services meet their SLA targets (goal: 99.9% success rate).
beats.testCase: collects CSS from components with template.classRefs (current export format)

then: classes deduplicate and normalize; mapping is complete

beats.title: Collect Layout Data
beats.userStory: As an operations system, I want collectLayoutData to execute reliably with latency < 1 second so that dependent services meet their SLA targets (goal: 99.9% success rate).
beats.testCase: builds create payload from clipboard-shaped component without preserving id

beats.title: Build UI File Content
beats.scenario: Generate or Create build Ui File Content
beats.userStory: As an operations system, I want buildUiFileContent to execute reliably with latency < 2 seconds so that dependent services meet their SLA targets (goal: 99.9% success rate).
beats.testCase: should build context for symbol generation

beats.title: Download UI File
beats.userStory: As an operations system, I want downloadUiFile to execute reliably with latency < 1 second so that dependent services meet their SLA targets (goal: 99.9% success rate).

then: a valid export JSON is built; size within baseline

movements.userStory: As a platform operator, I need export to serialize canvas and assets deterministically within ≤2s P95 with traceable audit.
movements.businessValue: Enables reliable operations with measurable KPIs; ensures consistent service delivery with SLA compliance (target: 99.9%)
